title: Archiv für Religionspsychologie
aka: Archive for the Psychology of Religion

contents.note: Publisher site (full text also available for subscription or payment)

additional-notes: Issues published from 1929 to 1936 use the title 'Archiv für Religionspsychologie und Seelenfuhrung'. There are long gaps in publication before and after this time period.

This is a European publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. More recent issues may be simultaneously published in the US, though we are not sure when that starts.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Ed Deegan for copyright research on this title.
